Context: Emily Bain is the Executive Director of College Governance, Policy and Board Secretariat at George Brown College. She has over 14 years of experience in the college sector, leading government and community relations activities and policy work. Prior to joining George Brown, she was the Director of Government and Community Relations at Sheridan College and held progressive leadership roles at Colleges Ontario including Senior Research and Policy Advisor, Manager, Government Relations, and Director, Government and Community Relations. Emily also has extensive experience working for governments in Ontario and Scotland. She holds a BA in Political Science and Business Administration from Wilfrid Laurier University and a Master of Science in International and European Politics from the University of Edinburgh. The phone number for George Brown College is 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, and email address is ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice. Emily's experience and education background are factual information from the text.
